name: Finger Guns - An ASL Typing Game
name_original: Finger Guns - An ASL Typing Game
description:
Finger Guns in a prototype for an ASL typing game ala Typing of the Dead.

It's a short 5 minute or so game-like teaching / practicing tool with a light, humorous narrative.

If you give it a go, your feedback is welcome and please enjoy!

More details and full gameplay available on YouTube, at the link above.
